ProductInfo.Features:
Processor - Intel i5 2500MHz || Memory Installed - 2048mb DDR3 > Upgradeable to 8192MB
Hard Drive - 250Gig Serial ATA || Optical Drive - NO OPTICAL DRIVE || Screen Size - 12.0" WideScreen LCD
Internet Connection(s) - The installed 802 11 ABGN WI-FI card will allow you to connect to any available wireless network, and the internal Ethernet port will allow a high speed wired connection
Software Installed - NEW Windows 7 Home Premium 32 Bit, word document & spreadsheet applications, shortcut to Microsofts free virus protection along with a restore partition on the hard drive for easy reinstallation. All software is Genuine!!
What's in the Box? - Dell Latitude E6220 with NEW pre-installed software, power cord, software registration instructions and a 60 day Warranty
